com.apriori.concurrent

Interface RunnableListenableFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the future value
    All Superinterfaces:
    Awaitable, Cancellable, Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>, Runnable, RunnableFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListenableFutureTask, ListenableRepeatingFutureTask, ListenableScheduledFutureTask, SettableRunnableFuture

    public interface RunnableListenableFuture<T>
extends RunnableFuture<T>, ListenableFuture<T>
    A combination of RunnableFuture and ListenableFuture.
